description.fr: Lorsqu’une {Summoning:898!} {%Attack} Confère son {%AT} en {%AR} à vos personnages.
description.en: When a {Summoning:898!} performs an {%Attack} Confers its {%AT} on your characters as {%AR}.
description.es: Cuando un {Summoning:898!} inflige un {%Attack} Confiere su {%AT} en {%AR} a tus personajes.
description.de: Bei einem {%Attack} einer Beschwörung {Summoning:898!}: Gewährt deinen Charakteren ihren {%AT} als {%AR}.
description.pt: Quando uma {Summoning:898!} lança um {%Attack} Concede seu {%AT} em {%AR} aos seus personagens.
